The Librarian I'm responsible for archiving and updating books containing information on every monster and item ever encountered. Browsing my archives is free but teleporting to monster's location can be very expensive.
Teleporting to Monsters and Raids always costs 1 Magic Candle.Candles can be obtained from Daily Reward Boxes or the Loyality Store.
